sys_sg_write_back_action_item.description: Action Item for allowing user to create an issue from a parent Program record
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Create Issue AI
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: issue_due_date={{Due Date}}^impact={{Impact}}^issue_classification={{Issue Classification}}^issue_type={{Issue Type}}^opened={{Opened}}^planned_start_date={{Planned Completion Date}}^planned_completion_date={{Planned Completion Date}}^priority={{Priority}}^state={{State}}^short_description={{Short Description}}^choice_template={{Choice Template}}^work_event={{Work Event}}^security_restriction={{Security Restriction}}^assigned_to={{Assigned To}}^EQ
